article.title: Analysis of Biological Publication Growth on the Basis of Periodical Sources
article.author: Mityaev, V. A.Minenskaya, S. A.
article.text: The dynamics of the growth of biological publications is investigated.. An analysis of this growth reveals certain uniformities in the evolution of scientific communications, which depend on the field of biology, and discloses the uneven rate of development in the individual fields.. It is concluded that the specialty is a major factor to be taken into account in defining the volume of information necessary for a specialist..
